objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Intuitive Mechanical Dials
• Fast Autofocus System
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Premium Fujifilm X-Series Mirrorless Camera Body with Classic Design
• High-performance XF lens mount system for exceptional image quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Versatile tilting LCD screen for creative shooting angles
• Precision mechanical dials for intuitive exposure control
• Fast autofocus system with multiple focus points
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Compatible with extensive range of Fujinon XF lenses
• Classic black finish with ergonomic grip design
• Electronic viewfinder with real-time preview
• Multiple film simulation modes for creative expression
• Weather-sealed construction for durability

banner_details:
The promotional banner is cleanly divided into four quadrants, hosting a bold layout with clear segmentation of content using a grid pattern. The top-left section features a large, bold text layer ("heading") accompanied by a prominent subheading ("subheading") and concise taglines ("tagline_1", "tagline_2"), ideal for highlighting a product brand and its unique value proposition. Below, a bullet list ("description") presents product specifications in a neat, informative format. 

The pricing ("price") is displayed prominently in bold typography, followed by a highlighted call-to-action ("cta") placed inside a rounded rectangle background ("cta_background"). The top-right showcases a high-resolution product image ("product_image") with a striking tagline ("tagline_3") and a subtitle for urgency ("tagline_4"), drawing attention visually and verbally.

Diagonal cross-hatch lines add depth and a modern tech feel. Iconic check-mark styled dividers and minimal illustrative elements enhance readability and separation.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A365D
- Slate Gray: #2D3748
- Light Gray-Blue: #CBD5E0
- Off-white: #E2E8F0
- Accent Orange: #FF6B00
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera prominently features a sleek and professional monochrome palette, giving it a premium look. Dominated by matte and glossy shades of black (#000000) and dark gray (#2E2E2E), the image gives a sense of precision and elegance. White (#FFFFFF) is used sparingly for high-contrast branding and numeric markers. Metallic silver (#C0C0C0) accents appear on dials and rings, enhancing the premium feel. Soft reflections and lens coating highlights introduce subtle tints of teal (#3FBAC2), gold (#D4AF37), and green (#A1C181). For an advertisement banner, a color palette with these tones creates a modern and clean aesthetic.
